gui.title: Ripple GUI
gui.tooltip: all your device settings are saved on internal flash

guiSD.title: Ripple GUI: data on SD card
guiSD.tooltip: all your device settings are saved on SD card

companionBle.title: Companion
companionBle.subTitle: Bluetooth
companionBle.tooltip: Chat via mobile phone App or Web Client - Radio can only connect via Bluetooth

companionUsb.title: Companion
companionUsb.subTitle: USB
companionUsb.tooltip: Chat via Web client or command line client - Radio can only connect via USB

repeater.title: Repeater
repeater.tooltip: Special role just for routing packets. Configured via Config/Console on flasher main page

roomServer.title: Room Server
roomServer.tooltip: Special role for local room server. Configured via Config/Console on flasher main page

v1.0.notes:
* Initial support for M5Stack Unit C6L
* ESP32-C6 Architecture

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.14.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.14.notes:
* NEW: 'Scan Local' menu in Discover
* Message text: now converts accented chars to ASCII equivalent
* Popular emojis now converted, eg ':thumbsup'
* Contacts can be tagged and custom notes added
* Repeater CLI, 'neighbors' command now using binary req/resp
* Max group channels now upped to 6
* Bug fix: some CLI responses were lost from dup timestamp.
* #channel key calc now forces lowercase
* Better canned messages for CLI screens
* Group channel message, 'Reply To' menu
* Kid Mode: now supports up to 1 group channel chat

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.12.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.12.notes:
* Vibe pref now saved
* Remote admin prefixes, extra spaces allowed
* Presets updated
* Msg details: ‘heard by’ 
* Repeater and room CLI: “get” command (get full telemetry)
* Channel details: Alerts ON/OFF menu

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.11.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.11.notes:
* New: Kid Mode and remote admin
* message details, ENTER to goto next message
* Group channel message rendering improved

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.10.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.10.notes:
* New network: region presets
* Security: new PIN Lock Screen
* Pixel art: improved colour picker
* Message details: new ‘Show on Map’ menu
* New clipboard system: long press for copy/paste

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.9.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.9.notes:
* Max group channels now 4
* Auto channel support (name starting with ‘#’)
* Home Screen: ‘$’ key jumps to next contact with unread > 0
* New message details screen (scroll up to msg, then select)
* GPS Config screen redesign
* Home Screen, tap on top-right of screen opens GPS Info
* Repeater and room server admin CLI: added “setperm” and “get acl” support

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.7.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.7.notes:
* Max contacts now doubled
* Only (home) contacts can now DM you
* Home Screen, swipe left/right to go thru filters
* Identity screen: new advert location pref
* New “Permissions” screen: set Telemetry permissions
* Map view: new “Set Advert Loc” menu.
* Canned Message: special “< prev msg>” item (re-type last msg)

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.6.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.6.notes:
* "Multi ACKs" support (Optimise menu)
* Advert path details (from node details screen)
* Group channel chats, message path details
* Home menu: Brightness DAY/NIGHT
* Canned Messages support
* MeshCore lib updates/fixes

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.5.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.5.notes:
* Sensor node support
* Preamble now 16
* Home Screen: node ID prefixes displayed
* Discover list: space to toggle ID prefixes

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.4.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.4.notes:
* Discover, Node details now shows advert path
* New GPS telemetry permissions: ALLOW:Home, ALLOW:All
* Group channel outbound messages now with confirmation counters
* T-Deck Plus (new keyboard model) auto backlight on/off
* Map labels now non-overlapping
* Network profiles now with customisable BW and CR

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-v7.3.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.3.notes:
* GPS tracks!
* Optimise menu: Interference threshold, AGC reset interval

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-UKStore-v7.1.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.1.notes:
* Channel details hex or base64 input
* Screen off long press shortened to 1 sec
* A-Z key press now jumps to contacts
* ‘@‘ key now refreshes/reorders list by most recent advert
* MeshCore lib updates/fixes
* better Help/Tutorial screens

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-UKStore-v7.0.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v7.0.notes:
* Saved paths, manual set path,
* Trackball press is now select, long press for screen off,
* Room keep-alive packets now not sent,
* Discover screen, max now 140,
* New customisable sounds: new-advert.mp3, existing-advert.mp3

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-UKStore-v6.9.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v6.9.notes:
* Sound and other prefs now persisted
* New “Show on Map” conversation menu
* MeshCore lib fixes

files.name: Ultra-TDeck-UKStore-v6.8.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v6.8.notes:
* Repeater & Room UI redesign
* Room, admin CLI now from menu

files.name: RippleUltra-TDeck-v6.7.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v6.7.notes:
* Public channel auto-configured (new profiles)
* Telemetry support (location, ‘online’ indicator)
* Rooms, unsynced counter (green)
* Room stats dialog
* Discover, ‘Send ID Broadcast’ menu

files.name: RippleUltra-TDeck-v6.6.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v6.6.notes:
* now saves repeater and room server passwords.
* New 'auto advert ON/OFF' option

files.name: RippleUltra-TDeck-v6.5.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

files.name: RippleUltra-TDeck-v6.3.bin
files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)

v6.3.notes: * BUG Fix: advert verify caused memory corruption

files.title: App firmware bin (use with m5 booloader)
